scenario_text.value:
Oh... It’s Renamon and the professor. So they
were in the music room?

What’re those two doing on the opposite sides
of the room?

(I know they’ve buried the hatchet, but I bet
things are still complicated between them.)
Hm?

Oh, Takuma, Agumon... Is there something you
needed?
No... We were just passing by, that’s all.
We were wondering what you’re up to.
Were you and Renamon having a chit-chat?
Renamon?
Oh... So he was here, too...
Wait, you didn’t notice?
I fear I was too lost in my own thoughts.
Perhaps he felt the same.

(If those two are that preoccupied, it must
mean...)

You were thinking about Miyuki—ah, I mean
your sister?
Well yes, for one. And then...
Professor?

Ah, pardon me. Indeed, I speak of my
sister...

And yet, there’s one more thing I have to
take care of.

(I think I remember Renamon mentioning
something about that.)
Hmm... I imagine you’ll understand someday.

But for now, could you please leave me alone
for a bit?

You got it. If you need anything, be sure to
let us know, okay?
Yes. You have my thanks.

I have a little more to think over. Sorry,
but could you give me a bit more time?
